96.eng-name: Holding Fast to the Qur'an and Sunnah

hadiths.text: Narrated Hammam:Hudhaifa said, "O the Group of Al-Qurra! Follow the straight path, for then you have taken a great lead (and will be the leaders), but if you divert right or left, then you will go astray far away

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِقْتِدَاءِ بِسُنَنِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: Following the Sunna of the Prophet (ﷺ)
